column1: nice and full on off, Shahzad converts it into a half-volley. He steps out and lifts it over mid-on for four
back of a length and on off, nurdled away behind square on the leg side
full and veering down leg, tickled away fine on its way - two fours off the first three balls for Afghanistan
on a length and just a shade outside off, patted to the covers off the front foot
back of a length on off, blocked
full on off, blocked back off the front foot
back of a length on off, defended off the back foot
back of a length on off, defended off the back foot
short, wide, asking for trouble. Scythed away in front of square for four
worked off the pads behind square on the leg side
very full and heading down the leg side, deflected away fine on the leg side for four
banged in short and outside off, no shot
good length on off, kept out
shuffles across and nudges a full ball behind square on the leg side
fuller and outside off, run down to third man off the face of the bat
short and outside off, hauled away to the midwicket boundary. Pulled with authority
back of a length on off, defended
shuffles across off and nudges a full ball to midwicket
full and holds its line outside off, Noor Ali aims to clear mid-on. No dice. He can only chip it to the fielder on the edge of the circle
very full on middle and leg, he falls over the flick and doesn't lay bat on ball
full, starts outside off and swings away, left alone in the channel
half-volley outside off, drilled to extra-cover, where the fielder makes a tumbling save
just short of a good length and outside off, played back
full and nibbles away outside off. He drives a long way away from the body and is beaten on the outside edge
pitched up and outside off, driven only as far as mid-on
back of a length and outside off, defended to the leg side off the back foot
full and outside off, nudged to midwicket
back of a length and outside off, guided behind point
That's a mini-helicopter from Shahzad. He jumps across off and whips it ferociously over square leg for four
worked away to midwicket
full and nips away outside off, no shot
Shahzad has helicoptered it over mid-on. On a length and outside off, whipped over the infield again. Bam!
patted to mid-on for an urgent single
down the track and clipped away to square leg
chipped in front of mid-on
edged but away from the reach of first slip. It might have fallen short had there been a second slip as well
full and angling into a front-foot push back to the bowler
nudged to midwicket off the front foot
whisked to Stirling at midwicket again
too full and outside off, Shahzad gets under it and hoists it over extra-cover. The outfield is slow following the rains over the last couple of days, but it has enough legs to reach the fences
tighter on off, played back
good length and just a shade outside off, ignored
patted to the right of mid-on for one
punched on the up to extra-cover
Rahmat gets off the mark after 13 balls Leg-stump half-volley, flicked away in the gap at midwicket
glanced off the pads to the fine leg fence
length around off, comes forward and drives it towards cover-point
short of length around off and angling in, Shahzad looks to flick it away, misses and gets hit on the body
a touch fuller around off, flicks it towards deep midwicket
an outside edge but falls short and wide of Balbirnie at first slip, was a touch fuller and wider, Rahmat pushes at it but soft hands saves him
length around off and middle, keeps a bit low as well, pushed towards short midwicket
length around off and middle, pushed towards mid-on
length around off, pushed towards covers
length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
length outside off, shaping away from the batsman who pushes at it and gets beaten
length around off, comes forward and defends with a straight bat
length around off, Rahmat stays back and opens the face of the bat to steer it towards third man
short of length outside off, Rahmat Shah is watchful there and leaves it alone
short of length on the body, pushes it towards short midwicket for one
back of length around off, stands back and defends it towards cover
back of length around off, defended once more from the back foot
length ball around middle and leg, flicked away towards square leg
falls just short of Adair at deep square leg, fuller on the pads and clipped away by Rahmat, Adair charges in, puts in the dive but it lands short just short
short of length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
looks to hit it hard but doesn't get the timing right, Porterfield makes a tumbling stop at mid-off
a bouncer from McCarthy angling in at the batsman who ducks under
length ball but down the leg side, called a wide
short of length on middle and leg, tapped away towards wide mid-on, McCarthy sprints to his right to field himself
short of length around off, looks to work it on the leg side, gets an inside edge on to the body
an attempted bouncer around off, Rahmat swivels and pulls it down towards fine leg
short of length around off, defended from the back foot
fuller on the pads, flicked away but a tumbling stop by Stirling at square leg
back of length outside off, punches it towards cover
length ball around off and middle, flicked away towards deep square leg
short of length around off, Shahzad brings out a short-arm pull towards deep square leg
length ball outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
back of length outside off, punches it towards cover for a quick single
a touch fuller and Shahzad goes over the bowler's head, not from the middle of bat and the mid-off chases it to keep it to two
ramped over the keeper this time, short from McCarthy, Shahzad bends his back and helps it for a boundary
short of length outside off, pulls it down towards deep square leg
short again, Rahmat Shah pulls it towards the left of the deep square leg, only a single though
short of length outside off, pulls it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for four, brings up his fifty as well
short of length around off, defended back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, Rahmat Shah comes forward and drives it through covers for four, all along the ground
back of length around off, stays back and defends it towards extra cover
short of length outside off once again, Shah rises with the ball and defends it towards point
short of length on middle and leg, flicks it away towards deep square leg
a beauty! Short of length outside off, Shahzad looks to push at it but gets beaten as the ball moves away in the air after landing
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
length around off, pushed towards extra cover
short of length on the stumps, goes back and drags it towards midwicket
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller once again, flicked towards midwicket, gets a single this time
down the ground to a full toss, pushed pass the diving short midwicket, a single to long-on
leg-stump half-volley to Rahmat. He picks it up, twirls his wrists, and chips it over square leg for a six
Rankin strays down the leg side again, Rahmat simply glances it away fine on the leg side past the diving keeper for back-to-back boundaries
Rahmat rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and guides a single down to deep third man
shortish on middle, Shahzad clears his front leg and swats a single away to deep square leg
dug in on off, Rahmat gets right behind the line and diffuses it
back of a length and homing in at off, defensively dropped to cover
tapped to long-off
Rahamt uses his feet and chips a flighted ball to mid-on
down the track and driven away wide of mid-on for one
tossed outside off, eased down to long-on off the front foot
full offbreak, driven with the spin to wide long-on and that's drinks in Belfast
mighty full on off, whisked away to midwicket
bursts from a back of a length outside off and goes past the outside edge
good length and moves away outside off, Rahmat reaches out for the ball and edges it away past the sprawling keeper for a fortunate four
on a length and outside off, driven on the up to the left of sweeper cover for one
just short of a good length and outside off, opens the face and helps the ball away to point
banged in short on middle, Shahzad gets inside the line and pulls it away fine of long leg for another four
skids on outside off, nudged to midwicket
back of a length on middle, hangs back and works to midwicket
full and outside off, defended back
flighted and just a shade outside off, played back again
down the track and clipped to short midwicket
short and spins back in, punched back
back of a length and on off, jabbed away to extra-cover
short on off, Shahzad rides it down to third man
short and outside off, punched to the covers once again
back of a length on off, defended back to the bowler
shorter and aimed at the top of off, Rahmat gives himself some room and slaps it away towards point
back of a length, angling in, and straightening away past the outside edge
skidder on off, chopped to point
shorter and breaks in, punched off the back foot to short midwicket
reverse-swept away behind point for one. Shahzad is showing his range in Belfast
uses his feet and drives to long-on t
tapped to the covers off the front foot
down the track and nudged away to the right of short midwicket
pitched up and outside off, Shahzad sizes it up and clubs it over mid-on for another boundary
full and holds its line outside off, driven on the up to mid-off
overpitched and outside off, driven through the line to the left of mid-off. Lovely timing and placement
full on middle, played back to the bowler
short and outside off, punched off the back foot to backward point
Shahzad backs away and goes inside-out over extra-cover
dinked into the leg side for one
down the track and driven down to long-on
sliding down leg, tickled fine
jabbed down to long-on
on a length and outside off, run away to short third man
short on off, misses a pull but is hit high on the thigh
back of a length and angling in, punched to midwicket
Shahzad backs away and drags off the inside half to long-on
down the track and cops it on the thigh pad
short on leg stump, Shahzad drops back, gives himself some roof and slams it away to the square-leg boundary. There's no stopping that
clipped to midwicket
full and outside off, swept flat and hard to long leg
forced to midwicket off the back foot
tugged away to long-on
short on leg stump, backs away and pummels it to the square leg boundary
backs away and punches to the leg side
picked off the pads to fine leg
full on middle, Shahzad gives himself some room and launches it nice and clean over mid-off
short on middle, Shahzad stays leg-side of the ball and jabs to point
driven with the spin to deep midwicket
forced to midwicket
down the track and whipped to long-on
swept hard and flat with the break for four
short and outside off, cut to point
short and wide outside off, Shahzad swings for the hills and winds up edging it fine of short third man for four
short, wide, flat-batted away to sweeper cover
banged in short and outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short on off, backs away and jabs the ball away to backward point
short of length around off, goes back and cuts it towards point
length around off, comes forward and flicks it towards short midwicket
worked away towards midwicket for one more
slips down the leg side and that needs to be bowled again
fuller on the stumps, goes down on one knee and slogs it towards deep midwicket for four
glanced towards short fine leg for one, moves to 99
fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it towards deep midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, flicked away towards fine leg
short of length on middle and leg, dabs it towards fine leg and that's his sixth ODI hundred, brings out the Chris Gayle helmet-on-the bat-handle celebration
back of length outside off, opens the face to run it down towards third man
fuller on the pads, pushed away towards deep square leg
length ball around off, stays leg side of the ball and pushes it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, slaps it towards mid-off, not the best of the timing though
caught at long-on. Use of feet by Rahmat Shah, reaches to the pitch of the ball and goes aerial but fails to clear Kevin O'Brien. An easy catch there for the allrounder
length ball on the stumps, punched off the back foot towards short midwicket where Porterfield dives to his left to make the stop
length ball around off, pushed towards extra cover
length ball on the stumps, flicked away towards midwicket

now Shahzad looks to go over the bowler's head, it was tossed up a bit, Shahzad was shuffling in his crease, never a stable base but looks to go for a six. Doesn't middle it though, O'Brien takes a couple of steps to his left at long-on and grabs another one
fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it towards the right of short midwicket
short of length outside off, pushes it towards covers
short of length outside off, left alone
length ball around off, stays in the crease and taps it towards cover
length around off, drives it between cover and point for a couple
length ball in the corridor, shouldered arms once again
fuller outside off, slashes hard at it, was in the air but away from the point fielder
worked away towards midwicket, and they sprint back for the second
length outside off, goes back and cuts it away towards point
length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards the right of the bowler
length ball on middle and leg, worked away towards short fine leg
short of length outside off, runs it down towards third man for a couple
length around off, comes forward and pushes it towards point
fuller around off, comes forward and hits it towards mid-on
short of length angling across, opens the face of the bat for a single to third man
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller on the pads, looks to flick it away but misses, gets a leg-bye to square leg
fuller around off, pushed back towards the bowler
fuller on the stumps, driven along the ground towards long-on
length around off, stays back and pushes it past short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
length around off, takes a step or two towards the ball and pushes it towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards long-on for one
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
a leading edge, length ball on the pads, closes the face a bit early in an attempt to work it on the leg side, gets a single as the ball dribbles towards covers
looked like a slower ball, Asghar looked to go big, moving across the off side, ends up playing early and the ball lobs next to him
length outside off, Asghar pushes at it and gets beaten
down the track and pulls this length ball outside off towards deep midwicket, smashed for four
and again, but this time ends up dragging it towards fine leg, and that's 200 up for Afghanistan
length outside off, works it towards third man for a couple. Hashmatullah Shahidi had to put in the dive to make his ground as the batsmen scamper back for the second
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, defended back towards the bowler
another batsman perishes while looking to clear long-on. Length ball around off, Asghar comes down the track and goes aerial. An easy catch for McBrine there
length ball around off, stays back and punches it towards the right of long-off
length ball on the stumps, defended back towards the bowler
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
short of length outside off, stays back and punches it towards covers
back of length outside off, dabs it towards third man for one
fuller on the pads, flicked towards square leg
back of length on the body, defended on the leg side
length around off, flicks it towards square leg
down the track and hits it towards long-off, only a single though
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
length ball around off, punched towards cover-point, a bit of fumble there
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards backward square leg
short and attacking the body, Naib fends it away off the back foot
back of a length and holds its line outside off, punched to mid-off off the front foot
Top-edged to short midwicket! Rankin runs in hard and hits the pitch harder. He rushes Naib into a hook. He skies it and it drops into the hands of a tumbling Stirling
lifter at the chest, fended off
banged in short on middle, blocked back
Rankin hits a hard length outside off, squeezed to point and Rankin rounds out a wicket-maiden
full and just a shade outside off, poked to cover
bouncer outside off, swing and a miss
on a length and outside off, opens the face and jabs it away to third man for four
back of a length and angling across off, opens the face and steers down to third man
lifter outside off, he can't connect with the ramp
fuller and outside off, squeezed to midwicket
tip and run to cover
lifter outside off, skied over midwicket
backs away and punches to sweeper cover
tip and run to the covers once again
bouncer, too high, wide
spliced over midwicket
dinked to third man, no-ball called
backs away and slashes to cover
short on the body, pulled to fine leg
back of a length and outside off, forced back to the bowler
rolls his wrists and pulls to long leg
full and outside off, punted over extra-cover, beats the man in the deep as well
top-edges a bouncer over the keeper for four
short, wide, flashed over cover
full-toss outside off, crashed over the covers and the ball pings the boundary
banged in short and outside off, waft and a miss, wide
short and outside off, backs away and carves it away through point for four
jabbed to point
on a length and outside off, Najibullah clears his front leg, opens up his hips, and smokes it over wide long-on
full on off, nudged through point
short and under-edged to the keeper
short on middle, flapped back to the bowler
backs away and punches behind point
bouncer on leg stump, Najibullah sits back waiting for this length. Hooked away fine over the keeper
banged in short and outside off, Najibullah takes it on with a hook. It swirls away from the reach of deep square leg
full and wide outside off, swished back to the bowler. Man down. Rankin's down. He has copped a blow on his right knee. He is in great pain and needs some medical attention
banged in short and outside off, hooks and sends a top edge swirling over the keeper's head
full and outside off, hacked to mid-off
dug short and outside off, beats the big hook
on a length on middle, clears his front leg and pumps it over mid-on
slower ball, but the length is still short, keeps low and rolls to the keeper
fast bouncer outside off, well over the head of Najib
short at the body, hooked to deep midwicket
that's outta here! Back of a length on middle, Najibullah clears his front leg and smokes it over midwicket and that's outta the ground
slow full-toss on middle, blasted over the bowler's head for another boundary
short and hits the bat hard, spliced back to Murtagh
just short of a good length and outside off, Najibullah picks up the length super quickly. He rocks back and nails a pull to the midwicket boundary, raising a 29-ball half-century

fuller and outside off, Murtagh misses his length and gets carted for a straight six. Pumped over his head and that's Shahidi's first six in international cricket and Najib is thrilled at the other end, having his hands aloft at the other end
dug in short and outside off, swivels on the back foot and hooks over midwicket
pitched up and outside off, dragged away in the air but holes out to wide long-on
length ball around fifth stump and swinging away, left alone
length around off, defended on the off side from the crease
fuller and wider, Stirling gets down and drives it emphatically past cover for four
length around off, this time pushed past the cover fielder, excellent timing on that
length around off, comes forward, gets behind it and blocks
length around off, almost squaring the batsman up while he was looking to work it on the leg side, a bit of a leading edge towards extra cover
fuller on the stumps, defended
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards square leg
length around off, punched towards long-on off the back foot
length around off, a mistimed pull towards square leg
length around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the pads, worked away towards deep square leg
fuller around off, a hint of awayswing, driven towards cover
short of length around off, comes down the track and looks to work it on the leg side, can only defend in the end
back of length around off, defended
length ball down the leg side, moves across and helps it to the left of fine leg
short of length around off, Stirling once again comes down the track and turns it towards short midwicket
length around off, defended from the crease towards extra cover
length around off, punched off the back foot towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
length ball on the stumps, McCollum was caught on the back foot but gets his bat down in time
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards square leg
down the leg side this time, glances it towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards short midwicket, and that's a maiden
length around off, slapped through covers but there is protection in the deep now
length ball, just around the off stump, defended from the crease
length around off, pushes at it but with soft hands and that's the reason the outside edge falls well short of second slip
length ball on the pads, McCollum looks to go big but misses and is struck on the thigh, collects a leg-bye though
short of length outside off, rises on the top of the ball and taps it towards covers for a quick single
short and way outside off, McCollum was moving towards the off side but leaves it alone in the end in hope of a wide, the umpires are unmoved
half a chance at short midwicket but Najib cannot latch on to it, length ball around off and Stirling looks to flick it over short midwicket, Najib goes one-handed but it doesn't stick
inside out over mid-off this time and it goes all the way for a six
length ball on the stumps, defended from the back foot
length around off and Stirling's quick hands come into play, whacked over midwicket for four
length ball on the stumps, stays back and defends
a touch short this time, flicked towards short midwicket
short of length around off, the ball hurries on to McCollum who was looking to pull it away, a single to fine leg in the end
length around off, punches it to the right of mid-off for one
length ball around off, defended on the on side

and he does go for the big shot but fails to middle it, ends up lobbing it to mid-off where Naib takes an easy catch. Was a length ball around off but the dot-ball pressure worked in the bowler's favour
length around off, comes forward and drives it back towards the bowler who bends down to make the stop
a bouncer this time, but Balbirnie ducks under it quite comfortably
length around off, stays in the crease and defends towards cover
length around off, comes forward and turns it towards short midwicket
down the leg side and a bit sloppy from Shahzad, fails to collect neatly
length around off, drives it towards long-on for one
length ball down the leg side, flicked towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps and slapped over short midwicket for a couple
length around off, goes back and cuts it towards cover
a bouncer from Dawlat but way too high and called a wide
fuller around off, looks to push over extra cover but a thick outside edge takes the ball towards third man
length ball around off, punches it firmly but straight towards the extra cover fielder
down the track and towards the off side but Dawlat slips in a slower ball, short of length down the leg side but Stirling fails to put it away, Shahzad makes a tumbling stop to his left
short of length outside off, slaps it away towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, and Balbirnie pulls it over square leg, not from the middle of the bat but will collect two
length ball around off and angling in, defended back towards the bowler from the back foot
length ball around off and middle, punched towards short midwicket off the back foot
length ball around off, Stirling backs away and lofts it over mid-off, Naib puts in the chase, and the slide to keep it to two
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
slog sweep from Balbirnie to this full delivery on the stumps, beats the fielder at short midwicket for four
flatter and quicker on the pads, flicked behind square for one
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards square leg
on a good length and on off, played back to the bowler with soft hands
back of a length and Alam explores the channel outside off, Balbirnie doesn't
Balbirnie stands tall to a short ball outside off and punches to sweeper cover
dug in short and outside off, Balbirnie skips back and pulls it over midwicket for four
overpitched and outside off, Stirling stays leg-side of the ball and laces it through extra-cover. Pings into the boundary
pitched up and outside off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
back of a length and just a shade outside off, hit back to Naib
short and angling into the body, fended back to the bowler
short on off, run away to point off the back foot
slower full ball outside off. Stirling goes hard at it, the bottom hand flies off the bat, but he still hammers it over extra-cover
back of a length and angling in at off stump, defensively dropped to cover
on a length and on a sixth-stump line outside off, not quite full enough for a drive. Balbirnie still goes for the strike and sends a thin edge behind to the keeper to leave Ireland two down
dug in short and outside off, tapped to the covers. Stirling brings up his half-century
good length, angling in from around the wicket and nips away a wee bit to beat the outside edge of Porterfield's bat
pitched up and outside off, Porterfield stretches out and drives to extra-cover
back of a length on middle, off the thigh pad and rolls away to the leg side
back of a length and outside off, struck to the covers off the front foot
shorter and outside off, Porterfield stretches out and carves it away to the off-side sweeper
short and on off, Stirling gets right behind the line and taps it to the off side
dug in short and outside off, Stirling aims for the pull and picks out Rashid Khan at deep square leg. Straight into the lap of the outfielder
back of a length on the stumps, clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
skidder outside off, short and outside off, goes on the back foot and slaps the ball away to sweeper cover
back of a length on middle, non-turner, hangs back and works a single to square leg
flatter and on off, played back to the bowler
flighted and outside off, turns away, driven to extra-cover
back of a length and outside off, defensively dropped to cover
short and outside off, swivels on the back foot and pulls the ball away wide of midwicket
full and nibbles away outside off, beats the outside edge
a googly outside off and spinning away, left alone
length ball around off, defended back towards the bowler
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket
fuller around off and middle, clipped away towards deep square leg
length around off, stays back and punches it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards long-off
length ball, around off, punched towards covers
length ball outside off, stays back and punches it towards extra cover
length outside off, looks to drive on the up and misses
Asghar Afghan takes a tumbling catch to his right. Short of length outside off and O'Brien pulls it off the front foot but fails to keep it down and Asghar takes a neat catch
short of length outside off, stays back and punches it towards right of long-off
length ball on the pads, stays back and flicks it towards square leg
length ball around off, comes forward and turns it away towards square leg
fuller around off, looks to drive but gets beaten as the ball spins away
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length around off and spinning away, pushed towards backward point
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
length outside off, stays back and punches it towards the right of extra cover, a one-handed pickup and throw by Rashid but Wilson was home
length around off, stays in the crease and pushes it towards point
length outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
short and wide this time, steered past the point fielder for a couple
short of length around off, pulls it gently towards deep square leg
length ball around off, defended down the ground from the back foot
beaten outside off, angling in from around the wicket, Porterfield hangs his bat out as the ball whizzes past
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards sweeper cover
back of length outside off, punched back towards the bowler this time
an attempted bouncer this time, pulled down towards fine leg for a couple
another bouncer but this time Porterfield lets it go through, called a wide
length ball angling in towards the off stump, punched back
goes for the reverse sweep but misses, an appeal for lbw but denied
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover for one
length around off, lunges forward and blocks
fuller around off, pushed towards covers for a quick single

was that a chance? Yes, definitely but Shahzad fails to latch on to. Wilson went for the reverse paddle but the ball hit the back of the bat, Shahzad went one-handed to his right but spilled in the end
another bouncer and this time it does the trick. Porterfield pulls it in the air, makes a fine connection but Rahmat Shah runs to his right and takes a good catch, it was hit firmly
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length outside off, defended on the off side
length ball on the stumps, defended on the leg side
short again but down the leg side, McBrine goes for the pull but misses. An appeal for caught-behind but called a wide
short of length outside off, pulls it in front of square but only a single
short of length outside off, some extra bounce there, defended on the off side
length around off, comes forward and defends

length outside off, McBrine plays back, gets an inside edge towards short fine leg, looks for a single but he's struggling there, Rashid collects the ball in front of the stumps and dislodges the bails to find the batsman short
fuller outside off, steered towards cover-point
length ball around off, flicked towards midwicket off the back foot
slower in the air, fuller around off, pushed back towards Rashid who makes a one-handed stop stooping low to his right
a bouncer outside off, Wilson looks to go for the pull from the front foot, misses
length ball around off, defended
short of length outside off, stays back and cuts it towards deep point
another bouncer, in the line of the stumps. Adair though has no problem ducking under
length around off, defended from the back foot
another short one but Adair pulls it over midwicket, a couple of bounces and over the deep midwicket boundary
dragged short and spins away outside off, slashed past the covers
slider, full and straight, clipped away in front of square on the leg side
looped up and dips on off stump, dead-batted away
flatter and wider of off, swept flat and hard to deep square leg
looks like a googly, tucked with the break down to fine leg
Rashid slips in a wrong'un, hits the pad, but this is heading down the leg side
fuller and outside off, reverse-swept away wide of slip fielder
skidder, Rashid shortens his length, jabbed back to Rashid
flighted and outside off, guided off the front foot to point
on a length and breaks away outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover
pushed through outside off - not much turn either way - push-driven through the covers off the front foot
tossed-up legbreak, spins away outside off, down the track and holes out to long-off
fuller around off, goes for the slog sweep but gets a top edge. Well short of the deep square leg fielder though
length ball around off, defended on the off side
fuller around off, pushed towards covers
fuller outside off, goes for the drive but gets beaten
fuller outside off, pushed towards extra cover, a bit of fumble there allows a single
uses his feet and drives it towards long-on
length ball down the leg side, turned away towards short fine leg
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards deep extra cover
fuller outside off, drives it towards extra cover
a googly from Rashid, the batsman goes for the reverse sweep and misses, a big appeal for lbw but denied. Rashid was convinced
a googly again, goes back and punches it towards deep point
fuller on the stumps, looks to work it on the leg side, gets a leading edge towards covers
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
fuller around off, looks to drive but gets an inside edge, just misses the stumps
slower around off, pushed back towards the bowler
short of length, goes for the pull but misses
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards deep extra cover
short of length outside off, pulls it behind square leg for four
length ball on the stumps, defends it from the back foot
bouncer but outside off, goes for the pull, gets a top edge over the keeper, one-bounce four
back of length outside off, chops it towards covers
fuller and wider outside off, McCarthy chases it, gets an outside edge towards third man
length ball on the stumps, dabs it in front of square
length ball outside off, comes down the track and hits it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket for one
slower one on the stumps, looks to work on the leg side and misses. An appeal for lbw and given
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-on
and that's fifer for Naib. Fuller around off, looks to go aerial but cannot clear mid-off, Asghar Afghan pedals back completes the catch
and that's fifer for Naib. Fuller around off, looks to go aerial but cannot clear mid-off, Asghar Afghan pedals back completes the catch
a bouncer outside off, Wilson leaves it alone and that's another wide
back of length outside off, arches back and dabs towards deep point
a bouncer this time, Wilson goes for the pull but is early into the pull, gets his on the shoulder. Collects a leg-bye as the ball dribbles towards third man
length outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler who has a shy at the bowler. The batsman was unmoved. An apology and a thumbs-up from Dawlat
short of length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket
short of length into the batsman, defended on the leg side

fuller around off, goes over mid-off but doesn't get the timing right, Rashid runs backward and stretches to his right, puts in the dive but cannot reach there. Looks like he has hurt himself in the process, but he is up and fine
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover for one
a length ball on the stumps, goes for the sweep and beats short fine leg
length ball outside off, comes forward to defend and gets beaten
fuller outside off, sweeps it firmly towards deep square leg
fuller on the stumps, looks to hit down the ground but gets beaten. An appeal for the lbw but it just pitched outside leg
length ball on the stumps, looks to defend on the front foot but gets beaten. Another appeal for lbw but going down
short of length outside off, pulls it towards long-on but denies the single
and that's the sixth wicket for Naib. A slower one around off, swipes it across but cannot clear Rashid at midwicket
